document.full_text: u.s. border patrol agents have arrested 13 illegal immigrants from mexico dressed in fake u.s. marine corps uniforms, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. border cops nab migrants from mexico in marine uniforms
lines_and_colors: u.s. border patrol agents have arrested 13 illegal immigrants from mexico dressed in fake u.s. marine corps uniforms, authorities said on tuesday.
